select.if: select u.*,o.org_name from org_user u join org o on u.org_id=o.id where username=#{username}

mapper.insert: insert into sys_operation (user_id,user_name,user_real_name,operate_text,client_ip,business_type,device_type) values (#{id},#{username},#{realname},'作家用户登录',#{clientip},'作家用户','PC')
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) pp FROM sys_operation o WHERE o.user_id=#{id} and o.user_name=#{username} and o.operate_date >= CURDATE() UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT datediff(CURDATE(), t.operate_date) pp FROM sys_operation t WHERE t.business_type = '作家用户' AND t.operate_date > date_add(CURDATE(), INTERVAL - (select point-1 from writer_point_rule where rule_code='max_login_integral') DAY) AND t.operate_date < CURDATE() and t.user_id=#{id} and t.user_name=#{username} GROUP BY datediff(CURDATE(), t.operate_date) ORDER BY datediff(CURDATE(), t.operate_date) ) t
mapper.insert: update writer_point set total=total+#{scores},gain=gain+#{scores} where user_id=#{id}; insert into writer_point_log (user_id,rule_id,point) values (#{id},#{ruleid},#{scores});
